title: Transmigrating into a Demon Spirit to Blow up the Entire World - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Supernatural   Xuanhuan   Yaoi
tags: Cute Protagonist   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Fast Cultivation   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Interdimensional Travel   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Mpreg   Naive Protagonist   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   S*xual Abuse   System Administrator   Tsundere   Twisted Personality   Weak Protagonist   World Hopping
author: 老碧
description:
Chen Tong is punished by a demon god to go to each world to be various kinds of spirits, fortunately regardless of what to cross, he is good at using demon spirit magic, healing, prophecy, psychic, all kinds of strong flaunting off isn’t good.

Thus, warlord and his little mirror, imperial prince and little fox, alliance head and little peach blossom, chief-executive’s little kitty…… having lived a life (chicken) full (flying) of blessing (dog) and beauty (jumping).

Only, –“Baby, when did you change into human form?” The man who is chasing after him regrets asks, “human form can then pa pa pa ……”>
